metadata.name: Boy's Club 9216
metadata.description:
This was my experiment that allowed me to estimate the scale of creating stop motion animation using real pixel pictures assembled with the help of constructor elements. 

Fan Art was assembled from 9216 pieces.
The work took 20 hours
The real size of the painting is 76x76 cm.
Photo resolution - 3286x3286 px
Used Mozambrick constructor
